tasks.docs: deno task docs:std && deno task docs:api
tasks.docs:api: deno run --allow-read --allow-env --allow-run npm:typedoc packages/hnxml/src/function.ts packages/hnxml/src/portRemap.ts packages/hnxml/jsx.ts --html ./docs/api --skipErrorChecking --options packages/hnxml/typedoc.config.json --readme packages/hnxml/README.md --name hnxml.js
tasks.docs:std: deno run --allow-read --allow-env --allow-run npm:typedoc packages/hnxml/index.ts --html ./docs/ --skipErrorChecking --options packages/hnxml/typedoc.config.json --readme packages/hnxml/docs.md --name 'Hnxml Standard'
